EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email sent to FO Owner when Funding Opportunity rejected by Program Approver
EmailTemplate.name: Funding Opportunity Rejection
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: {!Announcement__c.Name} has been Rejected.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Notification of the Announcement # {!Announcement__c.Name} rejection.
Hello {!Announcement__c.OwnerLastName},
This email is to inform you that the Announcement# {!Announcement__c.Name} has been Rejected.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
